description: A React component that implements a context menu which can be opened at specific x,y coordinates, and closes on blur or escape key press.

methods.name: ContextMenu({ x, y, onClose, children })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a customizable context menu and manages event listeners for closing it.

ctags.name: ContextMenu
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ContextMenu({ x, y, onClose, children }) {$/
